description: '''Bondan Prakoso''' (born May 8, 1984) is an Indonesian singer-songwriter, bass guitarist, and record producer. He is known as the former bassist of rock band Funky Kopral (1999–2003) and the lead singer of the [[rap rock]] collaboration band, Bondan Prakoso & Fade 2 Black (2005–2013). He has won several awards from [[Indonesian Music Awards]] with both Funky Kopral and his collaboration band, Bondan Prakoso & Fade 2 Black.
